name: 601 - Gold Label - Toro
additionalNotes: Produced by veteran cigar maker Erik Espinosa, the 601 Gold Label brand is another popular line extension in the company’s heralded portfolio. It’s a medium to full bodied Nicaraguan puro blend featuring the finest aged Cuban-seed tobacco grown in the most fertile regions of the country. The cigars are finished with a shiny, evenly colored mocha brown wrapper. Every puff on a 601 Gold Label cigar coats the palate with complex, well-balanced flavors of nuts, spice, earth, and rich, dark coffee, punctuated by a smoky, sweet smelling aroma.
